profile:
For 32 years, LawnSavers has focused on providing proven, organic-based solutions for Lawn Care & Tree Health Care. Our Fertilizing, Weed Control and Insect Pest Control Solutions are top notch. Naturally, this allows us to provide environmentally sustainable, healthy lawns & trees for a greener environment! 
 
We are a family-owned local Canadian company that's BIG ON SERVICE and taking care of people, including those team members that take care of you. We value old fashioned customer service, communication and partnership with our customers. We've grown a reputation of excellence through partnering with our clients. Deeply embedded in our culture, is that we always focus on great service, integrity, doing the right thing and real value. We are proud to be recognized as the 2022 "Best Lawn & Landscape Companies to work for" from Lawn & Landscape Magazine. 
 
We provide Natural & Organic Lawn care programs that include (better-than-golf course) Fertilizer, Effective Weed Control, Natural Insect Control & Pest Management. 
 
We specialize in lawn care services such as Weed control, weed removal, Lawn Renovation, No-Mess Liquid Aeration, PowerSeeding, OverSeeding, Topdressing & Compost Application, Mosquito Control, Perimeter Spider & Ant Control, Flea & Tick Control, Chinch Bug Control & Grub Control.
 
We are also a leader in Professional Christmas Lighting and Elegant Holiday Decorations!
 
Call or text us at 905-707-9994  416-707-9994 or 1-888-503-LAWN(5296) or visit https://lawnsavers.com to learn more and get a fast estimate customized for your property.
 
Our Risk-Free Guarantee ensures you get the best program value for the best price to ensure the best results. We are your true lawn care partners.
 
Our Lawn Care, Tree Health and Pest Control Service Areas include:
Ajax, Aurora, Barrie, Bradford, Brampton, Brooklin, Concord, Gormley, Etobicoke, Holland Landing, Innisfil, King City, Kleinburg, Kettleby, Maple, Markham, Milton, Mississauga, Newmarket, Nobleton, North York, Oak Ridges, Oakville, Pickering, Pottageville, Queensville, Richmond Hill, Scarborough, Sharon, Stouffville, Thornhill, Toronto, Vaughan, Whitby, and Woodbridge

profile:
At Hometurf Lawn Care, we have been treating the lawns of our loyal customers for over 30 years. As a family-owned and -operated business, we have grown by delivering lush, healthy, green lawns while using only the highest quality products applied by professional lawn care technicians. Let us help you make your lawn look its best this season!

Our season-long lawn care programs take the guess work out of which products to use and when. Applications are scheduled to be applied four to six weeks apart throughout the season for optimal turf care. We strive to ensure everything your lawn needs is included in our programs. No telemarketing or sales calls pushing unnecessary extras.

Our services include: lawn care programs, lawn maintenance programs, fertilizer, weed control, insect control, aeration, grass seeding, dethatching, top dressing, chinch bug control and grub control.

profile:
The Sprinkler Company Inc. specializes in the design, installation and maintenance of automatic lawn and garden watering systems, garden lighting systems for private and commercial property and full services on Landscaping Design. Sprinkler company also offers servicing of all types of existing irrigation systems, including system opening, closure, and repairs. 
***
We provide 5 YEARS WARRANTY FOR ALL OUR INSTALLATIONS.
***
More information on www.SprinklerCompany.ca
***
Please call us for FREE ESTIMATION.
***
Due to the situation with Covid-19, our company has become available online consultation, in some cases it is possible to conduct an online assessment of the planned installation.
The company continue to work officially. If you need help with seasonal Start-Up/Testing of the sprinkler system or any emergency service, we are ready to help you! All our technicians respect the social distance and have all the necessary equipment in the current situation regarding to COVID-19!

profile:
Frechette Lawncare is a family owned and operated business, servicing lawns in Toronto and surrounding areas for 50 years. We have an experienced team, on your lawns and in the office, that is ready to offer you lawn care that is effective and reliable. We are a responsible lawn care company, providing a healthy lawn that's healthy for you and your community.

Our season long program provides your lawn with frequent, light applications of perfect slow release fertilizer. This minimizes surge growth and eliminates any potential for leaching or runoff in your grass. This schedule also allows our technicians to monitor and address any problems as they arise throughout the season. Our fertilizers are custom blended, slow release, professional turf products made in Canada. They are a balanced combination of nutrients for your lawn. We fertilize your lawn the same way golf courses do theirs. Our fertilizers release nutrients gradually for a consistent feed all season long. The five applications include: spring, early summer, summer with kelp, late summer with kelp and fall fertilizers.
products:
We offer natural slow-release granular and liquid fertilizer. 

Fiesta Weed Control is a organic, iron based treatment that targets broad leaf weeds. 

The Grub Control is an organic treatment called Nematodes that target white grub and chinch bug. 

We also offer delivery of Ice Melter Reactor throughout the fall and winter season.
services: We offer a variety of lawn care services that will help your lawn looks its best. Our basic program is our Natural Fertilizers, which is 5 visits. We also offer natural weed control and grub control products. Additional services include aeration, over seeding and complete lawn restoration.
licenses: Ministry of Ontario Landscape Exterminator, Ministry of Ontario Pesticide Operator License
memberships: Landscape Ontario, National Association of Landscape Professionals

profile:
We at BlueValley Property Management are a team full of highly trained and experienced individuals. 
Our team has a combined experience of over 15 years. 
We have been operational since 2015. 

We are a year round property management company. 
We offer Landscaping and lawn care services through the spring ,summer and fall season. 
In the winter months we offer snow removal services. 
We specialize in commercial property Management and currently serve plazas, gas stations and townhouse complex. 

We offer Great service with great quality. 
We strive to exceed our customer expectations.
